com.jobboard.tracker.services

Class JobApplicationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jobboard.tracker.services.JobApplicationService

  • @Service
public class JobApplicationService
extends Object
    A Service layer class. The methods in this class are called by controller layers objects. contains all the business logic to add/update/delete/get job applications from database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JobApplicationService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteJobApplication(long id)
      contains the business logic to validate and delete a job application permanently from the database.
      JobApplicationRecords fetchjobApplications(long startId, long numberOfRecords, String userId, String univId)
      Contains the business logic to fetch job application based on some filters
      JobApplicationsMetaData fetchUserMetaData(String userId, String univId)
      Contains business logic to fetch the metadata of the job applications made by a user
      void persistJobApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
      Validates the job application and if validated successfully adds the applications to the database
      JobApplication updateExistingApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
      Validates the updated job application and updates the same record in the database

      • JobApplicationService

        public JobApplicationService()

    • Method Detail

      • persistJobApplication

        public void persistJobApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
        Validates the job application and if validated successfully adds the applications to the database
        Parameters:
        jobApplication - The job application received from the client through API request

      • updateExistingApplication

        public JobApplication updateExistingApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
        Validates the updated job application and updates the same record in the database
        Parameters:
        jobApplication - The updated values of the job application
        Returns:
        returns the updated record from the database.

      • deleteJobApplication

        public void deleteJobApplication(long id)
        contains the business logic to validate and delete a job application permanently from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique id of the job application to be deleted.

      • fetchjobApplications

        public JobApplicationRecords fetchjobApplications(long startId,
                                                  long numberOfRecords,
                                                  String userId,
                                                  String univId)
        Contains the business logic to fetch job application based on some filters
        Parameters:
        startId - the beginning id of the job application to fetch
        numberOfRecords - the maximum number of job applications to be fetched from the database
        userId - The unique id of the user
        univId - The unique id of the university/school
        Returns:
        returns the job applications fetched from the database

      • fetchUserMetaData

        public JobApplicationsMetaData fetchUserMetaData(String userId,
                                                 String univId)
        Contains business logic to fetch the metadata of the job applications made by a user
        Parameters:
        userId - The unique id of the user
        univId - The unique id of the university/school
        Returns:
        returns the job applications meta data.
